title: Format executor
description: Formats and lints a project using the dotnet-format tool

noRestore.description: Doesn't execute an implicit restore before formatting

fixWhitespace.description: Run whitespace formatting. Run by default when not applying fixes.

fixStyle.description: Run code style analyzers and apply fixes.

fixAnalyzers.description: Run 3rd party analyzers and apply fixes.

oneOf.description: A space separated list of diagnostic ids to use as a filter when fixing code style or 3rd party analyzers.
A list of diagnostic ids to use as a filter when fixing code style or 3rd party analyzers.

include.description: A list of relative file or folder paths to include in formatting. All files are formatted if empty

exclude.description: A list of relative file or folder paths to exclude from formatting.

check.description: Formats files without saving changes to disk. Terminates with a non-zero exit code if any files were formatted.

report.description: Accepts a file path, which if provided, will produce a json report in the given directory.

binarylog.description: Log all project or solution load information to a binary log file.

fix.description: Formats files and saves changes to disk. Equivalent to setting --check=false.
